inclusion.criterion: years, history of type 2 diabetes and mild hypertension (blood pressure < 160 X 100 mmHg) no longer than 15 years, body mass index < 35 Kg/m2, and glycated hemoglobin older than 35 years;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: history of type 2 diabetes mellitus and mild hypertension (blood pressure <160 x 100 mmHg) for a shorter period of time as 15 years;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: plasma concentration of glycated hemoglobin between 7.0 and 10.5%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: use of NPH (neutral protamine Hagedorn) or/and regular insulin;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pioglitazone, GLP-1 receptor agonist, DPP-4 inhibitor or acarbose;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: a serum alanine aminotransferase or aspartate aminotransferase level of more than 3 times the upper limit of the normal range;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago. He presents to the clinic with shortness of breath and fatigue during activities.
